scikits.statsmodels.stattools.durbin_watson¶

scikits.statsmodels.stattools.durbin_watson(resids)¶

Calculates the Durbin-Waston statistic

Parameters:

resids : array-like
Returns:

Durbin Watson statistic. This is defined as :

sum_(t=2)^(T)((e_t - e_(t-1))^(2))/sum_(t=1)^(T)e_t^(2) :

Previous topic

scikits.statsmodels.stattools.conditionnum

Next topic

scikits.statsmodels.stattools.jarque_bera
